pages.text: Using the powers of the Light, $(item)Nazars$() are commonly used to protect against $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)curses$().$(br2)When worn, they will cut the duration of any curse in $(marked)half$(). $(br)This requires about half of the wearer's $(marked)ME$().
$(o)You can equip this in the $(marked)Necklace$()$(o) trinket slot.
